refnamediv.refpurpose: Sets the text alignment of a label of a FLTK widget.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Plugin opcode in widgets. This opcode is part of the plugin repository and has to be installed separately. These FLTK widgets do not work on the Mac. The plugin repository can be found here: https://github.com/csound/plugins
FLsetAlign sets the text alignment of the label of the target widget.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: ialign -- sets the alignment of the label text of widgets.

The legal values for the ialign argument are:
1 - align center
2 - align top
3 - align bottom
4 - align left
5 - align right
6 - align top-left
7 - align top-right
8 - align bottom-left
9 - align bottom-right

ihandle -- an integer number (used as unique identifier) taken from the output of a previously located widget opcode (which corresponds to the target widget). It is used to unequivocally identify the widget when modifying its appearance with this class of opcodes. The user must not set the ihandle value directly, otherwise a Csound crash will occur.
